packageGuid.description: The GUID that will be associated with the C# project

aspnetCoreVersion.description: aspnetcore version to use, current options are: 2.0, 2.1, 2.2 and 3.0 (default)

interface-controller.description: creates interfaces and default implementation for controllers

sortParamsByRequiredFlag.description: Sort method arguments to place required parameters before optional parameters.

useDateTimeOffset.description: Use DateTimeOffset to model date-time properties

useCollection.description: Deserialize array types to Collection<T> instead of List<T>.

returnICollection.description: Return ICollection<T> instead of the concrete type.
